transArray.content: The room is small, a bit crowded, and the facilities are a bit outdated. The bedding was quite comfortable, and orange juice was available, but it wasn't orange juice, and it wasn't available all the time. It is also recommended to change your shampoo to a tear-free one. The service was pretty good.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and giving us the opportunity to serve you. We are very sorry to bring you a bad stay experience. Due to the renovation time of the hotel, there is indeed a certain gap between the hotel room area and the newly opened store. Although the majong is small , but the facilities in the room are complete, the hotel rooms and public area supporting facilities can meet your daily living needs. We will continue to work hard and use our careful work to exchange for your peace of mind and comfort when you check in. All the hotel staff look forward to your every stay Come and wish you a happy life. Manager: Ji Hongjiao
